subject: Cricket (Game)
lead_paragraph: The longstanding rivals were set to battle in Mohali, India, for a spot in the Cricket World Cup finals, the first match between them on nonneutral ground since the Mumbai attacks of 2008.
snippet: The longstanding rivals were set to battle in Mohali, India, for a spot in the Cricket World Cup finals, the first match between them on nonneutral ground since the Mumbai attacks of 2008.
